scriptmodule.description: Click product size by given count number.

command.name: click
command.target: css=#product-content div.product-variations ul li.attribute div.value ul.swatches.size li:not(.unselectable):not(.selected-value):not(.size-chart-link):nth-of-type(@{productSizePosition}) a

command.name: waitForElementPresent
command.target: css=#product-content div.product-variations ul li.attribute div.value ul.swatches.size .selected
